properties.name: Set To Top View
properties.desc: Zooms to fit the entire model, and displays it centered from top down.

properties.name: Zoom To Fit
properties.desc: Zooms to fit the entire model, and recenters around the centroid of the scene.

properties.name: Enforce View
properties.desc: Toggle enforcement of view state on frame change

properties.name: Unlocked Background
properties.desc: Indicator if loaded file has an unlocked background

properties.name: Background Color
properties.desc: The Primary Color sets the background color.

properties.name: Field Of View
properties.desc: Field of view for perspective mode

properties.name: Frames Per Second
properties.desc: Targetted FPS to attempt while playing.

properties.name: View Scale
properties.desc: The Scale to apply to both the viewers height and width when creating the image.  Values are truncated to integers when setting the actual width and height.

properties.name: Auto Scale Forward Facing Font
properties.desc: When the AutoScale Forward Facing Font toggle is selected all Forward Facing fonts in the image will be scaled depending upon the size of the output image.

properties.name: Anti Aliasing
properties.desc: The Anti Aliasing toggle when selected will apply a 4x4 anti-aliasing method to the output image.  This will double the rendered size of the image and then filter and subset to image to the correct width and height.  This process reduces the brightness of fine lines but it also smooths the lines and dramatically reduces jaggies.

properties.name: Anti Aliasing Weight Factor
properties.desc: The Anti Aliasing Weight Factor is used when Anti Aliasing the image.  When Anti Aliasing occurs the image is originally rendered at twice its destination size.  Each pixels color value is then interpolated by using the values of the 16 pixels that form a box around it.  The weighting factor makes the four pixels immediately surrounding the pixel a greater weight when determing the final color.  A higher weighting factor reduces the affect of anti-aliasing.

properties.name: Mask Background
properties.desc: The Mask Background toggle allows you to create an image with a transparent background. Please read the help for the Viewer module for the conditions needed for this feature.

properties.name: Mask Color
properties.desc: The color to mask in the output image.

properties.name: JPEG Quality
properties.desc: The JPEG Quality value affects the (*.jpg) output files. Higher qualities result in less LOSS to the image but create much larger files.

properties.name: Image Filename
properties.desc: The image format to use when creating the image.
